nodes.text: The planet Revyia was home to a temple created for members of the Tyia philosophy. The temple was grown from the largest trees on the planet. Following Order 66 wherein significant numbers of Jedi were killed across the galaxy, Revwien masters of the Tyia philosophy gathered in this temple, and after conferring, dispatched some of their best adepts into the galaxy to find and aid any surviving members of the Jedi Order.
